title: DDFP 389: Week 3 picks & Worst NFL Plays
itunes:title: DDFP 389: Week 3 picks & Worst NFL Plays
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank, Elliot Harrison and Patrick Claybon. They make their Week 3 picks during the Red Challenge Flag Picks segment. Plus, a new Worst Play in NFL history is revealed and the crew discusses if Johnny Manziel will return to the field this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
